thread.title: 2017 Infiniti Q60 Red Sport 400 Tested: State of the Halo Coupe
thread.title_full: 2017 Infiniti Q60 Red Sport 400 Tested: State of the Halo Coupe

author: Steve Siler
title: 2017 Infiniti Q60 Red Sport 400 Tested: State of the Halo Coupe
text:
-Remember when Infiniti was a performance brand? Yeah, it has been a while since then, but Infiniti appears to be getting some of its mojo back. The new, athletic-looking 2017 Q60 coupe is leading the charge, but is it the second coming of the beloved original G35 coupe? READ MORE ›› 
-
